name: nucleotide-analysis
title: NucleotideAnalysis
description: A link between a NucleotideSequence and a dwc:Event and a dwc:MaterialEntity from which it was derived, using a specified Protocol.

fields.name: nucleotideAnalysisID
fields.title: Nucleotide Analysis ID
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: eventID
fields.title: Event ID
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: molecularProtocolID
fields.title: Molecular Protocol ID
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: nucleotideSequenceID
fields.title: Nucleotide Sequence ID
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: materialEntityID
fields.title: Material Entity ID
fields.comments: Values of dwc:materialEntityID are intended to uniquely and persistently identify a particular dwc:MaterialEntity within some context. Examples of context include a particular sample collection, an organization, or the worldwide scale. Recommended best practice is to use a persistent, globally unique identifier. The identifier is bound to a physical object (a dwc:MaterialEntity) as opposed to a particular digital record (representation) of that physical object.

fields.name: readCount
fields.title: Read Count
fields.description: A number of reads for a NucleotideSequence in a NucleotideAnalysis.

fields.name: totalReadCount
fields.title: Total Read Count
fields.description: A total number of reads in a NucleotideAnalysis.
